Song.title: The Greatest Of All
Song.copyright: Chorus by Fanny J. Crosby Music and additional words by Pat Sczebel © 2007 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D Em | D/F# G | D Em | G]
Verse 1: The [D]greatest of all trans[G]actions The [D]costliest purchase [Asus]price [D]Father, Your [D/F#]Son’s a[G]toning death Was [D]given in payment for [Asus]mine To [G]buy me [D/F#]back from [Em]slavery To [G]set me [D/F#]free from my [G]chains
Chorus: Re[A]deemed, how I [D/F#]love to pro[G]claim it Re[A]deemed by the [Bm7]blood of the [G]Lamb Re[A]deemed through Your [D/F#]infinite [G]mercy Your [A]child for[Em]ever I [G]am
Verse 2: [D]Now I’ll never know [G]Your judgment You [D]ransomed and saved my [Asus]soul [D]Jesus, Your [D/F#]death and [G]Yours alone Has [D]canceled the debt that I [Asus]owed You [G]satis[D/F#]fied the [Gm]law’s demand And [G]new life’s been [D/F#]given to [Asus]me
Bridge: [D Em | D/F# G | D Em | Bm A | D Em | A G | F#m Bm7 | G (to chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 the greatest of all transactions the costliest purchase price father your sons atoning death was given in payment for mine to buy me back from slavery to set me free from my chains chorus redeemed how i love to proclaim it redeemed by the blood of the lamb redeemed through your infinite mercy your child forever i am verse 2 now ill never know your judgment you ransomed and saved my soul jesus your death and yours alone has canceled the debt that i owed you satisfied the laws demand and new lifes been given to me bridge
